name: Pharaoh Rebirth+
description: An ancient evil has been set loose, and Jonathan cursed in the process. Jonathan must now collect seven holy grails from around all of Egypt to cleanse himself of the curse of Sehur the First. Be delighted by the quirky humor, charming characters, and the beautifully designed world, in Pharaoh Rebirth+!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Direct 3D 9 supported DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 250 MB available space
